content: round row 30 knit 1st in single_crochet knit 1st in mc repeat for the rest of the round row 31 knit 2st in single_crochet knit 1st in mc knit 1st in single_crochet repeat for the rest of the round row 32 knit 1st in mc knit 3st in single_crochet repeat for the rest of the round row 33 knit all stitches in single_crochet row 34 knit 2st in single_crochet knit 1st in mc knit 1st in single_crochet repeat for the rest of the round we have finished the colour section cut of the main colour row 35-42 knit all stitches row 43 knit 6st knit 2 together repeat 7 times 56st total if you did 56 stitches decrease after 5st if you did 72 decrease after 7st row 44 knit all stitches row 45 knit 5st knit 2 together repeat for the rest of the round 48st total row 46 knit all stitches row 47 knit 4st knit 2 together repeat for the rest of the round 40st total row 48 knit all stitches row 49 knit 3st knit 2 together repeat for the rest of the round 32st total row 50 knit all stitches row 51 knit 2st knit 2 together repeat for the rest of the round 24st total row 52 knit all stitches now go ahead and cut your working yarn and use a darning needle to go through all the stitches and close the hat weave in all your ends make a pompom i make my pompoms by taking both of the yarns and wrapping them around my hand *last picture* once i feel like i´ve wrapped it enough times i take it off my hand tie a piece of yarn around it and cut it then cut the pompom until it is fluffy enough and i am happy with it lastly i tie it to the hat and weave in the two ends if this confuses you just look up how to make a pompom on youtube and do it your way these four columns repeat this is how they look next to each other ¨ hope you liked this pattern if you made something out of it please send me a picture on instagram i would love to see it have a lovely day instagram https //www instagram com/asny_42 i wrap the yarn like this until there is enough wraps works lovely for me
